column5: Is that Scugog where they are?

I was watching it at 9am this morning and they were fishing with Nik Anthropov on Lake Seymour fishing the pads and slop. Then later on in the show Ron was fishing with someone on lake scugog using jig's i think.
Ok were half way through  the show now and they starting on Scugog. Just all the slop at the beginning I thought it was the BOG
